title: Disorder
description: Anonymous peer-to-peer chat and file sharing platform with no database, no persistent storage and no server.
problem_solved: Discuss and share items fearlessly over the internet with all details lost upon disconnection

title: Somarthok
description: Sample demo for a compact website with desktop and mobile-friendly views

title: Jargonify
description: Silly experiment with the Datamuse API for paraphrasing text using random synonyms.

title: BRACU RS69 Routine
description: Schedule builder for the 69th Residential Semester
problem_solved: Worry no more about reading the inconvenient schedule image and simply get your meal and class timings all in one schedule!

title: BRACU Course Search
description: Quick lookup for course info from the Connect SLMS
problem_solved: Know exactly which faculty teaches which section of your desired courses for the upcoming semester comfortably and conveniently!

title: Chess AI vs AI
description: AI vs AI chess battleground
problem_solved: Applying MCTS and Q-Learning to entertain chess fanatics

title: Maze Visualizer AI
description: Visualizer for basic pathfinding algorithms
problem_solved: Making it easier to see how an AI agent may find its way through a maze

title: Impossible TicTacToe AI
description: Unbeatable tictactoe AI using the minimax algorithm
problem_solved: Example of instances where AI cannot be defeated

title: Sorting Visualizer
description: Visualizer for multiple sorting algorithms
problem_solved: Simple and easy visualization for new learners to the world of algorithms

title: Wine Launcher
description: Ultra minimalist way to launch Windows software (.exe) from Linux.
problem_solved: One-click EXE program running made easy

title: HH
description: Hex/binary editor for any type of file
problem_solved: Minimalist analysis of raw data from any file without breaking a sweat

title: YASS
description: Custom shell within the terminal
problem_solved: Quick template for implementing custom shells anywhere, anytime

title: CGPA Calc
description: CGPA calculator for BRAC University, supporting PDF uploading and real-time GPA auto-calculation.
problem_solved: Go back in time to see how your CGPA would have been affected based on different grade combinations

title: Z
description: Work-in-progress X/Twitter-clone with its own unique flavors
problem_solved: Socializing the way you want without fear of data collection or the hassle of ads

title: MAH Architects Inc.
description: Website built for MAH Architects Inc.
problem_solved: Establishing an online identity for the world to know about your brand

title: Repeat
description: Automation recorder for keyboard and mouse input and can repeat them continuously.
problem_solved: All your repetitive works performed by the machine while you relax and focus on the better things in life

title: Multoverse
description: Multiplayer 3D interactive space for showcasing my works

title: Bookseller Website
description: Customer order management webapp for online booksellers and bookstores
problem_solved: All your customer orders stored securely and safely in one convenient place

title: Netstate
description: Check internet speed, local and global IP addresses, etc.
problem_solved: Get a quick glimpse of your current network speed and conditions while not having to think twice

title: Jam
description: Play/listen to YouTube music videos in peace, without any ads or distractions
problem_solved: Listen to hour-long music compilations ad-free without showing off the questionable thumbnail to peeking eyes

title: Drone Zone
description: Simple survival game about Boids simulation and bees

title: Wow
description: Raid-resistant peer-to-peer video chat and meetings platform
problem_solved: Conduct virtual conferences while keeping intruders out or scratching their heads

title: Paint
description: Simple and easy instant whiteboard designed to be lightweight
problem_solved: Instantly begin annotating or sketching in case your regular whiteboard breaks down

title: SecHero
description: Android app for checking device security integrity, app permissions, and diagnostic info.
problem_solved: Stay informed about your phone's health without paying for insurance

title: Metrobus Tracker
description: Track metrobuses to decide the fastest route
problem_solved: Decide for the fastest route by locating the bus nearest to your stop

title: Romulus
description: A simple pseudo-chatbot that talks arrogantly

title: BRACKET
description: (Unfinished) messaging platform

title: Zen-G
description: (Unfinished) zombie survival game. Icon is from Recoil by Martin Magni, Fancade.

title: Wildest Dimensions
description: Visual novel-style game based on ITWD

title: Dolly
description: Multi-modal and multipurpose Discord bot, inspired by MEE6, Dank Memer and many more
problem_solved: Keep your Discord server alive with conversation by introducing a virtual economy and entertainment system

title: Delta Telekom
description: Top-down 2D game for making a parody of a few online users on Discord.

title: Welcome to Bangladesh
description: Welcome to a wild and chaotic sandbox full of Bengali culture and content. Explore a city ridden with battles between the police and criminals as you try to survive and maintain your rank and prestige by conquering the city with your combat skills.

title: Goofy Gunners
description: Welcome to a chaotic world full of street activity where you can become a local king and dominate over your rivals or rule the skies with a flying car while showering your enemies with rockets from above!

title: Goofy Obby
description: You've played lots of other obbies before, but none like this one! Step right in and get hit by a dozen obstacles and worse - responsibilities!

title: Broken.
description: This is a bizarre sandbox full of opportunities for testing your friends' PvP skills, friendly trolling, roleplaying, grinding or simply goofing around 24/7. In this pocket-sized city, prepare to gear up for survival as the agents of the MBC take no mercy upon criminals!

title: Demon Hunting Paradise
description: A new game, coming soon. Currently in an early alpha access stage. Data may not be saved properly! Features may be missing.

title: Bangla Battlegrounds
description: Dominate the scenario with your martial arts and combat tactics, climbing up ranks and defeating your rivals.

title: Photon.
description: An abstract experimental experience that transcends beyond human psychology.

title: Save Her
description: The moment you stop playing the game, she dies! Don't stop; keep her alive for as long as you can. She might be a stranger to you, but she's equally innocent. She wants to live, to see another bright day. Would you not want to see her smile?

title: MandelEx
description: Fractal visualizer in real-time.
problem_solved: Dive deep into the world of the Mandelbrot fractal, even if you don't own a beefy PC

title: HueCube
description: Chrome extension for skipping YouTube ads gracefully
problem_solved: YouTube ads kept at bay via their own tools

title: Serverwise
description: Message and event logging module for Discord.js bots
problem_solved: Monitor or keep a backup of all activity in your Discord servers the easy way

title: Guardian
description: Discord.py bot with safety and pranking features
problem_solved: Sleep peacefully knowing that your server will never see any unauthorized links or inappropriate messages

title: Pcryt
description: LFSR-based encryption in Base64
